VUPShionMod:HyperdimensionalLinksPower.NAME: Hyperdimensional Link
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end combat with #b10 or more #yHyperdimensional #yLink, a random card will be upgraded.

VUPShionMod:PursuitPower.NAME: Pursued
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the target's turn, #yPursuing #yFunnel deals #b

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaCorePower.NAME: Anastasia Core
DESCRIPTIONS: [E] and draw a card whenever you play a #yFunnel card.

VUPShionMod:AttackInitiationPower.NAME: Initialize
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%d cards this turn, draw #b1 card whenever you play a card.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormKuroisuPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Cloyce
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, put #b%d #yQuick #ySkim on the top of your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:UpgradedReleaseFormKuroisuPo.NAME: Liberated Form: Cloyce+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, put #b%d #yQuick #ySkim+ on the top of your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:BleedingPower.NAME: Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes #b%d additional damage from Attacks this turn. NL Its stack halves at the end of turn.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormMinamiPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Minami
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger the passive ability of #yFunnel by cards, trigger #b%d additional times.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhuPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Liyezhu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yHyperdimensional #yLink, gain again at the start of each of your turn.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhuBPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Liyezhu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal damage #b%d times as much as your #yHyperdimensional #yLink to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:ReleaseFormLiyezhuCPower.NAME: Liberated Form: Liyezhu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:LockOnPower.NAME: Locked On
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy takes #b%d additional damage from Attacks.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderAlphaPower.NAME: Order: Aggressive
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn is increased by #b%d times. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderBetaPower.NAME: Order: Concussive
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now hit ALL enemies. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderGammaPower.NAME: Order: Harrasing
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now also applies #b2 #yBleeding. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderDeltaPower.NAME: Order: Versatile
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel each turn now grants you equal #yBlock. NL Incompatible with other Orders.

VUPShionMod:AttackOrderSpecialPower.NAME: Order: Special
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt by #yFunnel now hit ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:DelayAvatarPower.NAME: Lure
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yLure has #b%d HP remaining. NL It deals #b%d damage #b5 times to ALL enemies upon being destroyed.

VUPShionMod:AnticoagulationPower.NAME: Anticoagulated
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%d turns, #yBleeding does not half at the end of turn.

VUPShionMod:HolyCoffinSinkingSpiritPower.NAME: Holy Coffin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain or lose #yHyperdimensional #yLink, gain #b%d #yBlock.

VUPShionMod:LoseHyperdimensionalLinksPow.NAME: Lose Hyperdimensional Link
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next #b%d turns, lose ALL #yHyperdimensional #yLink.

VUPShionMod:DefectPower.NAME: Crippling
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you receive #yunblocked damage from this enemy, lose #b%d Max HP.

VUPShionMod:ShockPower.NAME: Agitating
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you receive #yunblocked damage from this enemy, #ydiscard #b%d rarest cards in your draw pile.

VUPShionMod:DestroyPower.NAME: Pulverizing
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you receive #yunblocked damage from this enemy, #yexhaust #b%d rarest cards.

VUPShionMod:LifeLinkPower.NAME: Life Link
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, revives at full HP if other enemies are still alive.

VUPShionMod:QuickTriggerPower.NAME: Sequence
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d times when #yLoading #yComplete cards are created, trigger them at once.

VUPShionMod:StrengthenPower.NAME: Ferocity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, gain #b%d #yStrength.

VUPShionMod:ChaoticPower.NAME: Chaotic Reshuffle
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you shuffle your draw pile, shuffle 2 #yDazed into it.

VUPShionMod:IterativePower.NAME: Iterative Evolution
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, grab a random number to determine whether to buff themselves or to debuff you.

VUPShionMod:StiffnessPower.NAME: Stiffness
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon adding up to #b4, remove all #yStiffness and end your turn.

VUPShionMod:VampireFormPower.NAME: Vampire Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal #yunblocked damage, heal #b%d HP.

VUPShionMod:MensVirtusquePower.NAME: Anima Virtutis
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger #yMagiam #yObruor, you no longer lose energy and gain #b%d #yCor #yGladii instead.

VUPShionMod:HeliumLuxquePower.NAME: Lux Helii
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:NoSkillsPower.NAME: Mors Inevitabilis
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer play any #ySkill.

VUPShionMod:PoisePower.NAME: Poise
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yBarrier. NL You no longer gain #yStiffness.

VUPShionMod:GainCorGladiiPower.NAME: Focus
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:WeatherEyePower.NAME: Weather Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack, gain #b%d #yBlock.

VUPShionMod:PreTripleDamagePower.NAME: Prepare Triple Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, your #yAttacks deal triple damage.
For the next #b%d turns, your #yAttacks deal triple damage.

VUPShionMod:TripleDamagePower.NAME: Deal Triple Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your #yAttacks deal triple damage.
For the next #b%d turns, your #yAttacks deal triple damage.

VUPShionMod:NextTurnAttackPower.NAME: Draw Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, draw #b%d #yAttacks.
At the start of next turn, draw #b%d #yAttacks.

VUPShionMod:TurnDexPower.NAME: Gain Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yDexterity.
